1349240.name: Sharecare YOU Demo
1349240.description:
Sharecare YOU Demo is no longer available for sale on Steam. However, if you previously purchased the app, it is available for you to download via your Steam account.

---

Sharecare YOU Demo is a limited, sneak peek at the full version of Sharecare YOU. Explore the anatomy and physiology of several organs, including the eye, brain, liver, spinal column, and stomach. Study informative labels and use unique controls to customize your experience.

Enjoy our Demo? Check out the FULL version! Sharecare YOU is a fully immersive, photorealistic simulation of the human body, enabling anyone to explore its astonishing details in full 360 degrees. Interested in learning about a specific organ? With the click of a button, travel inside, visualize its natural function, and dive deeper. Want to learn even more? Check out the many tags and labels along the way to gain even more information and insight. Easily customize YOU to better understand physiology and simulate disease. You can even personalize our avatars to be a virtual you – your health, your conditions. It really is all about YOU.
1349240.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
